org.eclipse.scada.core.subscription

Interface SubscriptionListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataItemSubscriptionListener, EventListener, MonitorListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionCommon, SubscriptionRecorder

    public interface SubscriptionListener
    A basic subscription listener that acts as a base interface for all subscriptions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateStatus(java.lang.Object topic, SubscriptionState subscriptionState)
      The subscription status update method.

    • Method Detail

      • updateStatus

        void updateStatus(java.lang.Object topic,
                SubscriptionState subscriptionState)
        The subscription status update method. It is called by the SubscriptionSource whenever the subscription changed.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic that is notified
        subscriptionState - The new status of the subscription
